function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection methods for medical devices and surfaces","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases in healthcare settings","Mitigation":"Implementing proper combination of UVGI, surface disinfectants, and mechanical friction for thorough disinfection","Technologies":"UVGI, automated portable UV-C devices","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, infection control teams"},{"Description":"Ineffectiveness of no-touch full room disinfection","Impact":"Risk of not achieving thorough disinfection of all room surfaces","Mitigation":"Using a combination of traditional cleaning and disinfection with UV-C devices and mirrors to bounce UVGI around the room","Technologies":"Automated portable UV-C devices with mirrors","People":"Building occupants, visitors, cleaning staff","Owner":"Facility management, cleaning services"},{"Description":"Lack of reliable UV dose evaluation model","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation of UV dose for disinfection","Mitigation":"Implementing an analytical model for evaluating UV dose using computational fluid dynamics","Technologies":"Computational fluid dynamics, analytical UV dose evaluation model","People":"Researchers, facility managers, infection control specialists","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare facilities"}]}
